title: () San Javier - 5 Barrio Veneziola C

title: (30380) La Manga - 1 Calle Tucumán

title: (30380) San Javier - 1 Urbanización Veneziola Golf

title_short: (03190) Pilar de la Horadada - Calle Alfaz del Pi

title: (30380) San Javier - 2 Calle A

title: () San Javier - 10 Calle C

Toilets available in the restaurant bar on the beach, you can spend the night there without any problem and it is very quiet outside the summer season. Large campsite nearby (Camping Lo Campo)

title: () San Javier - 1 Calle Oasis-Pl G

name: Camping Mar Menor
title: (30730) Camping Mar Menor
description: The location on the shores of the Mar Menor, between Los Alcázares and the San Javier airport (Murcia). Due to its natural environment and views of the sea, it is the ideal destination to enjoy the sun and relax. Camping Mar Menor has different types of plots, where you will find modern, clean and extensive facilities and services.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 14 Urbanisason Mil P Vistamar
description: No amenities

title: () San Javier - 2 Calle H
description: Small asphalted area with space for 5 or 6 motor homes. Sandy beach a few meters. Without services You can sleep peacefully without noise, just the sound of the sea. In busy summer.

title: () San Javier - 13-15 Calle G

title: (30380) San Javier - 3A Calle K

title: () San Javier - 21 Calle H

name: Camping San Javier

Taking a short walk you will reach a shopping center. Very good option in summer, although you have to park at night or in the early morning to take a seat. There is a playground next to it.

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - CV-941

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 7 Calle N.Ribera-M
description: Parking is good. It's close to the parks.

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 1 Calle Bergantín

title: (30710) Area NAREJOS
description: Welcome to all, sanitary facilities with toilets, shower, laundry and free wi-fi at reception. The price includes two adults. There are three slot sizes at a slightly different price. There is a restaurant and bar on site. There is a bike path, water and waste disposal are included.

title: () San Javier - 2 Calle M
description: Parking large and empty enough for mid-August. There are 2 motorhomes and a camper van. Beach 100 meters.

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 14 Calle Amura
description: Quiet parking area and for summer nights some air runs

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 17 Calle Caña
description: Parking lot near the beach and near a big park. Slept here in december without problems. It is probably more busy in high season.

title: (03189) Dehesa de Campoamor - 1 Calle Gloria Fuertes
title_short: (03189) Dehesa de Campoamor - 1 Calle Gloria Fuertes

We have not seen any water sources or bathrooms, (we are not looking for much, the walk is long) it's good to do it only one night (there is no sign that prohibited)

title: (30380) San Javier - 1 Calle M

title: (03189) Orihuela - 49A Calle el Torreón

title: (03189) Orihuela - 66 Avenida del Cabo
description: A nice quiet place to spend the night.  Walks along the esplanade.  Shops close by.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 107 Calle Ortosa
description: Earthen car park under construction there are 2 bowling green at the back Lighting, pizzeria 50 meters away Accessible to any size camper van quiet for one night

title: (30739) Roda - 2 Calle Dolores
description: Parking area in the San Javier area, Roda MURCIA. We spent a quiet night; in the early hours of the night and early in the morning you can hear the vehicles that pass by the road (via the town itself, people who go to work). Next to it there are 2 bars.  Los Narejos beach at 3km, 15 min by van and 35 min walk. Easy parking near the beach.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 2A Calle Carriles
description: Street that flows into the sea. Pedestrian walk below. Rock beach, good for diving. Quiet area and very guarded. The immense villa next door has surveillance cameras everywhere, so the area is very safe.

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 1 Calle Río Aller
description: On road in in developed area near beach. No facilities.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 1 Calle Mar Rizada
description: Small carpark between privates houses in a quite neighborhood. It gets busy at the weekends. Steps lead down to the beach. 1 or 2 places at weekends and maybe more available during quite weekdays.

title: () San Javier - 20 Polígono Q
description: First line of the beach. no problem for holy week. perfect for van

title: (03189) Orihuela - 2 Calle Mar Gruesa
description: Mega place in the off season with great views on the beach

title: (03189) Orihuela - 2 Calle Cala Cpitán C Rg
title_short: (03189) Orihuela - 2 Calle Cala Cpitán C Rg
description: Small car park with 6 parking spaces and 3 for the disabled. It is attached to Cala Capitán and is flat, unlike the other car parks nearby. These are normal parking spaces so I see it as small depending on the motorhome, our van is 6 meters and we think that is the maximum to be able to park. Being in low season, you can go to the beach with a dog, and we who traveled with 2 young children really enjoyed both the beach and the very long walk along the completely pedestrianized coast, which is beautiful.

title: (30739) Dolores - 14 Calle de León Felipe
description: Nice quiet place to park at night very nice village

title: (03191) Pinar de Campoverde - 29 Calle Tejo P C
title_short: (03191) Pinar de Campoverde - 29 Calle Tejo P C
description: Parking near sport facilities and restaurant at the edge of the town of Pinar de Campo Verde. Garbage and recycling bins are on the parking. Nice walks along the river with small canyons. Quiet.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 1 Calle Paz Zen
description: Quiet parking near shopping centers and the beach.

title: (03189) Orihuela - Carretera de Villamartín
description: This is a parking place for a shopping centre. Motor homes stay here regularly.

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 40 Calle Mar de la China
title_short: (30710) Los Alcázares - 40 Calle Mar de la China
description: Parking along the streets, in front of children's games, without services

title: (03189) Orihuela - 136 Calle Violetas
description: Parking on the first line of Cala Estaca on the elevated with beautiful views and walking path. Quiet place but not to take out tables

title: (03189) Orihuela - 19 Calle los Nardos
description: Busy during the day, but ideal at night

title: (03189) Orihuela - Carrer los Claveles
description: Beautiful palm boulevard directly along the sandy beach. Fantastic view over small, palm-lined bay and the sea. Dog beach nearby. Pleasantly busy during the day, at night we were alone.

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 38 Avenida Trece de Octubre
title_short: (30710) Los Alcázares - 38 Avenida Trece de Octubre
description: Only parking without services shops nearby. solar compacted earth.

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 19 Calle Vicente Aleixandre
description: Dissuasive parking provided by the town hall. Suitable for large volume vans and vans. The narrow streets of the neighborhood are not suitable for motorhomes. Tight 90 degree turns.

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 156 Avenida Trece de Octubre
title_short: (30710) Los Alcázares - 156 Avenida Trece de Octubre
description: Laundery with free wifi: WZE4733E

title: (30592) Torre-Pacheco - Unnamed Road
description: Paisaje Protegido Cabezo Cordo car park. Perfect for visiting the caves of Sima de las Palomas. Lots of opportunities to walk in the natural park. Solid ground to park.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 10 Calle Santa Alodia
description:
Parking for motorhome by Lidl, a bit loud from the motorway, but a good place to spend the day/night.
short walk to euromarket, restaurants and bars.

title: (03189) Orihuela - Paseo Marítimo
description: A beach bar at the end of March to December. Parking only for the small caravan around 7 Mr. Restaurants easy within walking distance "El Capitan".

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 2 Calle Poeta Salvador García Jiménez
title_short: (30710) Los Alcázares - 2 Calle Poeta Salvador García Jiménez
description: Former bus station with 5 covered and about 25 open parking spaces.

title: (30380) San Javier - 32 Calle V
description: Parking at the foot of the beach, there is another one just one street ahead that we saw marked but we got confused at the beginning and we discovered another, great in case the other is occupied, they are the same size. Great to park and enjoy the Mar Menor. Fine sand and very few people, it is seen that people pull more for the other area of open sea. Ideal beach with children since no matter how much they get in, it barely covers, shallow depth without unevenness and water like a table and warm. Great to jump on a giant float and relax !!!!

title: (03189) Orihuela - 11 Paseo Marítimo
description: Caution. Only for small campers and vans. Bad distance to the end about 100 m. bar on the beach. Great dawn! Many fishermen

title: () San Javier - 34 Calle V
description: Calm assured Many mosquitoes. Very humid, too ventilated, risk of submersion in case of rain.

title: (30710) Los Alcázares - 9 Calle 6
description:
Good place to stay for

 one night or two. Flat area and a park is near by.

title: () San Javier - 1 Urbanización Torre Riviera
description: Ideal for a stopover in a cove, in low season, water available.

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 5C Calle Albariño
description: Self-service laundry, located in a shopping center, with a large parking lot and easy access. next to a CONSUM supermarket, a Pharmacy and several restaurants.

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 1J Calle Albariño
description: Wooded and secluded park to spend the day and / or spend the night. No service but right next to a shopping center with everything you need to stock up. 10 minutes from some coves and many places of tourist visit.

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 3 Calle Acantilado
description: A cool little place to stay between the "Nautilus" restaurant parking lot (is currently open and illuminated for a long time) and the forbidden path to the beautiful sunrise view at the dog beach :) You will be able to see the line too of Torreviaja skyline. Be careful on the driveway, the road has a deep hole. Go straight ;) When it rains there is water under the car, when it is sunny there are a lot of people on the road. During the day, the parking lot can be used by the restaurant.

title: (30368) Cartagena - 22 N-332
description: Good place for a break, also suitable for an overnight stay. Small parking for a maximum of 6 vehicles. Right on the street, so not so quiet. Approximately 30m to a small beach.

title: (30592) Torre-Pacheco - Unnamed Road
description: Not pretty but if you are in a pinch it will work. Almost level, bit of trash from the orchards thrown around. Next to this there is also a dead end street you could park on, it also has trash but it is level. No shade, no services

title: (30368) Cartagena - 7 F-34
description: Easy street parking. Ideally located with access to the water and privacy for a campfire. We have our washing machine drum with us and will make ourselves comfortable by the fire. ?

title: (30380) San Javier - 1 Urbanizacion Castillo Mar II Pl Z
title_short: (30380) San Javier - 1 Urbanizacion Castillo Mar II Pl Z
description: Parking in the car park of the Castillos de Mar urbanization. In beachfront. Next to a Spar supermarket, a butcher, a Chinese store and several typical beach shops where you can buy floats, glasses, some household items, a tobacconist nearby. There are also several restaurants around where you can eat in a more or less acceptable way. There are only garbage cans. The beach has footbaths and a toilet booth, it also has access for people in wheelchairs. At night there are always kids playing soccer but they don't make much noise It's close to CC El Zoco and a children's fair

address.street: 1 Urbanizacion Castillo Mar II Pl Z

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 12 Paseo de los Conquistadores
description: This is street parking. Motorhomes have been made welcome in the past There are three bars close by. In high summer it will be busy.

name: Aparcamiento Torrevieja
title: (03185) Aparcamiento Torrevieja
description: Parking lot with camper service. 50 meters from the sea. With toilets, showers, laundry, dryer. Pool next to the parking lot (managed by another company), vending machines (water, soft drinks, etc.). Gray and black water disposal. Fill up with water and connect to electricity. Very close to Torrevieja Hospital. Supermarkets and restaurants nearby. Municipal bus stop, at one of the pedestrian entrances to the car park. Beach 50 meters away. Dog beach 500 meters. Tents are not allowed (chairs and tables or similar may not be set up). Business hours from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. Pre-reservations are currently being accepted and processed in the order in which they are requested. Places of interest: - La Zenia Boulevard Shopping Center 9 minutes, 6 km - Corvera-Murcia International Airport 44 minutes on the AP-7 - 45 minutes on the N-332, without tolls. - El Altet-Alicante Airport 45 minutes on the AP-7 - 45 minutes on the N-332, without tolls. Golf courses: - Real Club de Golf Campoamor (Orihuela-Costa) at 12.6 km, 17 minutes - Las Colinas Golf & Country Club (Orihuela-Costa) at 12.9 km, 18 minutes - AP-7 Motorway, at 8 minutes, 4.8 km. Marinas: - International Marina (Torrevieja) at 3.7 km, 8 minutes - Marina Salinas (Torrevieja) at 4.7 km, 11 minutes. Nearby places of interest: Orihuela 25 kms. Elche, Alicante, Murcia, La Manga del Mar Menor.

title: (30368) Cartagena - 11 Calle Laguna de la Albufera
title_short: (30368) Cartagena - 11 Calle Laguna de la Albufera
description: Parking around a park and just in front of the beach. Next to it there is a nautical club. There is a portable toilet and a water point.

title: (03186) Torrevieja - 3 Calle Salvador Dalí
description: Free water refill at side of car wash behind Repsol gas station

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 5 Calle Mar del Norte
description: Street perpendicular to the promenade is quieter. We slept perfectly all night. Too many people pass by on the walk and it becomes difficult to rest. It is the Cantabrian Sea Street. Parallel to is the one we spent the night with.

title: (03186) Torrevieja - 27 Calle Levante Bal
description: It is next to the hospital and has a 24/7 Repsol gas station next door (entrance to the car park through the roundabout where these two are located) the gas station has a 24/7 shop and has a bathroom to go to, it has a good connection to the urban buses being able to take the DF and E lines at the hospital and has views of both the sea and the lagoon

title: () Torrevieja - 8B Avinguda Mare Nostrum
description: This is street parking. There is a supermarket and bars close by.

title: (30380) San Javier - 5A Calle Poligono Z-1
description: Repsol petrol station with drinking water. After information, the water is free but we still put a little gasoline.

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 37 Avenida Desiderio Rodríguez
description:
A parking area with a sea view that can accommodate medium-sized motorhomes and mobile homes. 
 A very beautiful place.
 There are also restaurants where you can go to the toilet and take food and drink

title: (03193) San Miguel de Salinas - 68 Avenida de Levante
title_short: (03193) San Miguel de Salinas - 68 Avenida de Levante
description: Free parking with views

title: (03186) Torrevieja - Calle Ercina
description: Large parking at the edge of the saltworks. No service but very quiet. Access by dirt road a little hunchback, I think to avoid in rainy weather

title: (30368) Cartagena - 21 Calle Lopez Villalobos
description: Free mixed parking next to the entrance to the Mar Menor Tranquille regatta club at the end of the year

name: Camping "Florantilles"
title: (03186) Camping "Florantilles"
description: "Florantilles" campsite with all services, supermarket, bar ...

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 9 N-332
description: Torrevieja cemetery parking lot, lots of parking spaces, very quiet, close to the N332, shady, no service

title: (30380) Cartagena - 1D Gran Vía de la Manga
title_short: (30380) Cartagena - 1D Gran Vía de la Manga
description: La Colada. Open 365 days from 8:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. It has 3 washers and 2 dryers.

title: (30368) Cartagena - 4 Paseo Marítimo
description: 'The car park is right in front of the Mar Menor, in the southern part, a quiet area, with a small promenade. The best if you like to walk or run, the route along the quiet shore. Good place if you have a pet. good place to sleep

title: (03181) Torrevieja - P.º Juan Aparicio
description:
Authorized parking also for campers. asked directly to the staff present. also possibility of overnight stop. very close to the naval museum with the possibility of visiting a submarine. 
You're practically on the seafront in Torrevieja. restaurants and shops... there are no services of any kind in the parking lot.

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 39 Calle Doña Sinforosa
description: Parking in a cul-de-sac in a park. In it 2 wells with drinking water, about 50m from the road.

title: (03181) Torrevieja - 5 C Salero
description: Paid parking without any service but monitor. Quiet and close to the center, we spent 2 quiet nights

title: (30383) Cartagena - RM-F54
description: Huge desert area (well packed sand and salt) separated from the sea by a cordon of dunes. Windy this day. Nights prohibited

title: (03181) Torrevieja - Local 6 Blanco Muelle Pesquero
description: Large parking lot at the port of Torrevieja, right on the promenade with restaurants and shops

title: (03181) Torrevieja - 30 Calle de Pedro Lorca
description: It is a laundry located in the heart of Torrevieja (Calle Pedro Lorca corner Calle Heraclio), it is difficult to park in the area (and more with motorhomes / vans) so I recommend going from the parking place on foot or by urban bus (stop Hotel Fontana , lines A, A2, B, E and G)

title: (03184) Torrevieja - av de la Estacion
description: Parking where you can spend the night without problems, a little noise due to the road

title: (03181) Torrevieja - 23 Calle Ciudad de Barcelona
description: Calm. Place of passage for people who walk their pets. Next to the highway. Supermarket nearby.

title: (03181) Torrevieja - 76b Calle San Luis
description: Self-service laundry in the center of Torrevieja, parking is complicated by the area, so it is advisable to come from the parking area by urban bus (lines A, B, C, E and G, La Gaviota stop)

title: (30380) Cartagena - 10-4 Polígono Gola Sur
description: Public parking, 20m from the beach, flat. There are no services. 12 seats. We had a very quiet night in May. Trash bins. With green area for dogs. I don't know how it will be in high season.

title: (03182) Torrevieja - 2 Calle Nuestra Señora de Monserrate
title_short: (03182) Torrevieja - 2 Calle Nuestra Señora de Monserrate
description: Street at the foot of the promenade. To come in the off-season. Pleasant walks and surrounded by restaurants, supermarkets and bakeries.

title: (03182) Torrevieja - 52 Calle Patricio Zammit
description: Parking space in the middle of Torrevieja where you can also stay overnight. No amenities.

title: (03182) Torrevieja - 34 Calle Almudena
description: Laundry in the Playa del Cura area, good communications, complicated parking but the bus station is next door

title: (30383) Los Nietos - 36 Calle del Galan
description: Free parking, ideal for stocking up on supplies. The small Spar market has a great range at reasonable prices for its size.

title: (30383) Cartagena - 79B Avenida de la Marina
description: Positioned on the edge of the lagoon, level, compacted sand/gravel which should be avoided when wet & windy. No services but quiet out of season and no barking dogs.

title: () Torrevieja - 238 Calle Ramon Gallud
description: Free parking on the side of the road with great views and walks the town is a 5m walk away.

title: (30380) La Manga - 2 Poligono Vivero
description: Magnificent lake view. quiet, ideal for children and dogs.

title: (30380) Cartagena - 32-40 Calle Nautilus
description: Free parking, very quiet night.

title: (03184) Torrevieja - 7A Urbanización San José Sector 10
description: LPG station

title: (30384) Cartagena - 30 Calle Isla Blanca
description: Free parking very good area near the beach ... Not recommended in warm months.

title: (30380) Cartagena - 42D Polígono Entremares
description: This is a public car park suitable for 6 RVs. Standing right on the beach with an unobstructed view. Bike path 50 m away. No traffic noise, just the sound of the sea.

title: (03184) Torrevieja - 7 Avenida Rosa Mazón Valero
description: Miele self-service laundry. It is located in the parking lot of the Habaneras Shopping Center (Floor -1).

title: (03183) Torrevieja - 17 Avenida de las Cortes Valencianas
title_short: (03183) Torrevieja - 17 Avenida de las Cortes Valencianas
description:
Car wash with facilities for taller motorhomes (it will probably be an issue for longer vehicles, or those towing) - they have a movable platform allowing you to clean the top of your vehicle.
Instructions for use are clearly given in three languages.

title: (30380) La Manga - 9 Poligono Vivero
description: A large vacant lot facing the sea. Quiet in winter. No convenience. Road access.

title: (03184) Torrevieja - 2C Lugar Urbanizacion Doña Ines
description: Brilliant parking when we stayed here. A little busy with vehicles until 12am and then it becomes silent. No height barrier. If you park close enough to the carrefour building you  can recieve FREE WiFi (you're welcome). We were not disturbed

title: (30380) Cartagena - 20 Polígono Entremares
description: Parking with sea view, stayed 3 cc, no worries out of season

title: (03183) Torrevieja - 2M Calle Josefa Rebollo Rodriguez
description: Large gravel lot on the edge of an industrial area (possibly future building site), gas stations nearby if someone has problems with their car, there are a few workshops nearby, some of which also speak German

title: (03183) Torrevieja - 4 Avenida Alfredo Nobel
description: Found this location room for around 20 campers a short walk in to the town lovely views   Open wast ground part car park

title: (30380) Cartagena - 57 Polígono Playa de los Alemanes
title_short: (30380) Cartagena - 57 Polígono Playa de los Alemanes
description: Asphalted area and without traffic, it has a party area nearby but you sleep well without noise.

title: (03183) Torrevieja - 54 Avenida de las Cortes Valencianas
title_short: (03183) Torrevieja - 54 Avenida de las Cortes Valencianas
description: It is a car park on both sides of Avenida Cortes Valencianas, it has a little noise since too many cars pass through it

title: (30700) Torre-Pacheco - s/n Plaza Rosa Regas
description: Quiet place to spend the night.

title: (03184) Torrevieja - Calle de las Lavanderas
description: Near the pink lake, free parking near a park. Very quiet, lots of space. Warning: don't leave your car unattended here, they infiltrated ours and stole everything in the middle of the day! police said it was okay here, small vehicles only.

title: (03183) Torrevieja - 74 Avenida de las Cortes Valencianas
title_short: (03183) Torrevieja - 74 Avenida de las Cortes Valencianas
description: Laundromat

title: (30380) Cartagena - 79 Polígono Playa de los Alemanes
title_short: (30380) Cartagena - 79 Polígono Playa de los Alemanes
description: We stop for the day in front of the water. Quiet, with a little bar next door, and a tap to wash your feet. The water has quite a lot of algae but you can swim.

title: (03184) Torrevieja - 190 Calle Venus
description: Quiet place to spend the night in the center between the inhabited area and a bar

title: (03184) Torrevieja - 7B Calle Jose Lorca Garcia
description: Petrol and diesel service available brand new with very cheap price (diesel 1.22). Washing station next to it not open yet.

title: (03183) Torrevieja - 129 Calle Zv 42
description: It is a car park located next to the Vicente García soccer field, it is a quiet and peaceful area to spend the night, it has the market a few steps away and quite close to sports areas and institutes (in fact here for the school bus of one of them) It has Mercadona nearby and a gas station with laundry

title: (30385) Cartagena - Calle Aníbal
description: Parking at the beach. with showers and we on the beach. few shops

title: (03313) Torremendo -
description: Quiet Cookie!! Close to the lake (not for swimming). Good for a van. When it rains it can get muddy quickly! Spent 2 quiet nights there :) nice bike ride around the lake possible... Very relaxed!

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 44 Paseo Playa de Levante
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 44 Paseo Playa de Levante
description: Ground parking on the beachfront and next to the beach bar. Quiet at night, you can sleep without discomfort.

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Punta Cocedor
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Punta Cocedor
description: Wonderful place , quiet and 10m from the water. Beautiful . Avoid in summer.

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Cabo Falcón
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Cabo Falcón
description: Beautiful views in La Manga, without services, very quiet and always accompanied by campers.

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle G
description: No view but large empty tarmac area next to where a supermarket used to be. used for access by locals. Level scrub land next to tarmac. 2 supermarkets within 5 minutes walk.

title: (03313) Torremendo -
description: Access by gravel road. Small very steep descent then the last 100 meters on the slopes. Access to the Spot a little tight, beware of large size. Spot isolated from the wind and the sun from view. 4G internet ok.

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 36 Calle Punta Sabinar C. Palos
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 36 Calle Punta Sabinar C. Palos
description: Parking at the end of Cabo Palo. Small pebble beach below and breathtaking view of the lighthouse and the sea. No shade but little traffic at night. Parking lot saturated during the day.

title: (30591) - 16 Calle Murcia
description: Parking along the road. Very well

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 10 Calle los Palangres
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 10 Calle los Palangres
description: Port at the foot of the sea, close to shops and cafes.

title: (30370) Cartagena - 1 Caserio Atalaya
description: Free water tap at BP gas station

title: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Punta Barriga
title_short: (30370) Cabo de Palos - 1 Calle Punta Barriga
description: Parking at the end of a very busy street with beautiful sea views

title: (30366) El Algar - 7 Calle Castelar
description: Laundry

title: (30385) Cartagena - 3 Lugar los Ventorrillos
description: A petrol station with a small city crossroads, you can also fill up with water.

title: (03313) Torremendo - 4 Calle Jose Antonio-torremendo
description: very large recreational area with tables, barbecue, garbage cans etc with many trees, lots of shade. We have been able to enter with the van without problem and our dogs are delighted.

title: (03183) Torrevieja - 2S Carretera Alicante
description: Dirt parking next to Quirón Hospital, it has space for many people, good views and close to the Mercadona supermarket (you can walk)

name: Camping Caravaning Capfun La Manga
title: (30385) Camping Caravaning Capfun La Manga
description: Tycoon campsite. 1 km long with direct access to the beach. WC gray water emptying service and clean water filling. welcome speaks French. A bit expensive but lots of activities

title: (30370) Cartagena - 1 Calle Brezo
description: Behind the supermarket, ideal to rest or go on Sunday at the cabo de palos market

title: (03183) Torrevieja - 0 Calle Diana
description: It is the Mercadona SURFACE car park (not the underground) you can spend the day. It has Mercadona and a shopping center with all the services next door

title: (03313) Torremendo -
description:
View of L'embalse, alone in the world.
The path is correct but be careful if it rains it becomes mud

title: (03193) Torremendo - 5 Lugar 15
description: Slightly sloping car park, ideal for spending a night, very quiet, beautiful view of the lake which is 300m away, large spaces for dogs

title: (03313) Torremendo - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place next to the water. Super quiet and the sunsets are amazing. The water is super nice. A bit trash everywhere. I would recommend a 4x4 because we was here after a week of heavy rain, so the path was very muddy and one bigger step down(for a non 4x4).

title: (30385) Los Belones - 3 Calle Delta del Misisipi
title_short: (30385) Los Belones - 3 Calle Delta del Misisipi
description: Large parking lot to spend the night without problem and ideal for going to the Calblanque natural park since overnight stays are not allowed there. Just a slight hum from the highway in the background, but very quiet.

title: (30384) Cartagena - 2 Lugar Cabezo Negro
description: Next to the parking and entrance of the regional park of Calblanque. September we were alone and the nights are very quiet, despite being relatively close to a highway. You also have a public fountain (water) very close, like 10 minutes by car. You can search it by putting in Google "Fountain of the Belons".

title: (30385) Los Belones - 4 Calle Marín
description: Ground parking area. peaceful. Without services, in the town near bars, pharmacy, butcher shop, etc.

title: (30385) Los Belones - 15 Carretera de Cabo de Palos
title_short: (30385) Los Belones - 15 Carretera de Cabo de Palos
description: Laundromat. Large car park 30m away
